text:
Guest wrote: Guest wrote: Guest wrote: Quoting limited to 3 levels deep



Before anyone asks, she came out as "no labels" aka bi. Quoting limited to 3 levels deep http://www.standard.co.uk/lifestyle/esm ... 46156.html Before anyone asks, she came out as "no labels" aka bi. Has she publicly dated any men? Has she publicly dated any men? I am going to take her own her word and not my wishful headcanon. If she says her attraction surpasses labels, aka bi, I believe her. I am going to take her own her word and not my wishful headcanon. If she says her attraction surpasses labels, aka bi, I believe her.

It's not like I know who she is. I've heard of her though on this forum of course. But "I’ve had very serious relationships with lots of people, and I’m a very expansive human. There’s no part of me that can be put under a label. I really don’t fit into a box — that’s too reductive" is tiptoeing. You can't say she basically came out as or is bi when she didn't mention men but people. Her wording made it sound like she just doesn't want to be pigeonholed.
title: Who will come out? (2017)
